body_html: Not only this. Sometimes you have tensors that you want to stash in your module, but they're not persistent. Think of an RNN module that holds the last hidden state so you don't need to pass that around.
body_text: Not only this. Sometimes you have tensors that you want to stash in your module, but they're not persistent. Think of an RNN module that holds the last hidden state so you don't need to pass that around.
body: Not only this. Sometimes you have tensors that you want to stash in your module, but they're not persistent. Think of an RNN module that holds the last hidden state so you don't need to pass that around.
